examples.comment_1: Add an image watermark to a {{FileFormatUp}} file
examples.comment_2: Pass the file path to the {{TextWatermarker}} constructor
examples.comment_3: Create an image watermark using your image file
examples.comment_4: Save the {{FileFormatUp}} file with the watermark

content.title: **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}}):** A powerful Python library for {{EnvName}} that lets you add watermarks to your documents with ease.
content.step_1: **Main Class: Watermarker.** Start by creating a {{TextWatermarkerBold}} object. Give it your {{FileformatCap}} file, either as a file path or a stream, to get started.
content.step_2: **Build Your Watermark.** Next, make a Watermark object of the type you want. You can place it on any page or even in document elements like images or headers.
content.step_3: **Adjust the Look.** Set up the watermark’s size, position, font, and color to match your needs.
content.step_4: **Add and Save.** Use the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} method to insert your watermark. Add as many as you want, then save the file wherever you like.

more_features.title: Discover More Watermarking Tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} gives you advanced options for adding and customizing watermarks in many file types. Protect your documents and images with flexible, easy-to-use features.

feature_1.title: Full-Page Tiling
feature_1.content: Cover your entire document with tiled watermarks. This makes it hard to remove watermarks and keeps your files protected without ruining the layout.

feature_2.title: Custom Colors
feature_2.content: Pick any color for your watermark to match your brand or document style. Make your watermark stand out or blend in as needed.

feature_3.title: Extra Security Options
feature_3.content: Boost your document security with layered watermarks. Combine visible and hidden marks to prevent copying and make sure only the right people can access your files.

code_1.title: Add a Watermark to PowerPoint
code_1.content: This sample shows how to put a watermark on the background of PPTX slides.
